forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 5am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 61, with temperatures rising to around 66 overnight. South southwest wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 11am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 11am and 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 82, with temperatures falling to around 76 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 14 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
